sequence:
Sirius' Improvement Plan

<size=45>Chapter 4 - Big Seven Advice</size>

scripts.say: Nelson, Rodney, please share your insight with me.
I don't know how useful our advice would be, but we could maybe teach you something.
Nelson? Please, the Commander directly asked us for help, so we should take this seriously.
I decided to ask Nelson and Rodney on Sirius' behalf for advice on how to behave at a formal banquet.
Then for starters... let's get an idea of the situation. What's the status of your preparations for the banquet?
Her Majesty will have Lady Warspite for protection, so my plan thus far is to be the Master's bodyguard instead.
I have done a general background check on all of the attendees, and my survey of the perimeter's defences and emergency escape routes is 90% complete.
Lastly, I've prepared various banquet items for the Master, installed a communications device in the Master's car, prepared spare clothing, and prepared antiemetic medicine.
I guess the maids' advice was useful to Sirius, seeing as she prepared an extra set of clothes and some anti-nausea medicine.
H-huh, I see... You've prepared for just about everything...
If there is anything I may have not accounted for, please do let me know.
Um, Nelson... I think we should probably start with teaching her the basics of attending a banquet.
That should be everything. Oh, right, I nearly forgot to ask an important question: do you have a dress prepared?
Figures... You should go ask Illustrious or Akashi. You're basically already wearing a dress, so they might be able to get you a new one right away.
Nelson, Master, you have my sincerest thanks for all of your help!
...You could say that again. Nelson and Rodney were a huge help.
